# This file is automatically generated by FixIncludes tool.

set(SOURCE_FILES_LIST
    "main.cpp"
    "Application/Ftp/FtpServer.cpp"
    "lib/nvs/NvsStorage.cpp"
    "lib/system/DateTime.cpp"
    "lib/system/TimeSpan.cpp"
)

set(INCLUDE_DIRS_LIST
    .
    "Application"
    "lib"
    "Application/Ftp"
    "Application/Hardware"
    "Application/Web"
    "Application/Web/core"
    "Application/Web/file"
    "lib/common"
    "lib/json"
    "lib/nvs"
    "lib/rtos"
    "lib/stream"
    "lib/system"
)



# Register component with ESP-IDF
idf_component_register(
    SRCS ${SOURCE_FILES_LIST}
    INCLUDE_DIRS ${INCLUDE_DIRS_LIST}
)

# Disable promotion of truncation warnings to errors
target_compile_options(${COMPONENT_LIB} PRIVATE "-Wno-format")
